website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, breathable and stylish pajama. While it requires hand washing, the pros outweigh this minor con.
pros: Not only is this pajama set designed with a smooth, lightweight fabric, customers also praise its cute, stylish look
It is ideal for sleepwear because the fabric is even gentle enough for sensitive skin and has a comfortable, slightly loose fit
cons: This set must be hand washed, and if it is not washed properly can begin to look worn more quickly
A few customers also preferred a more fitted style

customer_reviews.title: Waist band needs some work
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this and the material. The material is very soft, slinky, and light. It’s not super warm, it’s more of a cooling pj set to me, good for warm weather. The fit was tighter than expected. It wasn’t tight, but a slim fit pj set which I’m not used to. The elastic waist band is thin which makes it not as comfortable as other pj sets. I washed about 3 times and the ribbon tie (which doesn’t do anything, It’s more like decoration) fell off. I already feel the thin elastic waist band flipping and turning around. When it starts to flip-the pants will be tossed.
customer_reviews.author: Ming H

customer_reviews.title: but in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 12 and I bought an XL. They are too big on me, but in a good way... Like I'm wearing a boyfriends t-shirt. If I wanted something more fitted I could have bought a L, but I bought them for post-surgery so I wanted something really roomy and comfortable. The fabric is so soft and comfortable and the patterns are so cute with the colored ribbon and button details. I sent back the other brands I bought and ordered 3 more in this style, both long sleeve with pants and short sleeve with shorts. I'm in love with these PJ's.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: SO Comfy and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: These pjs are SO comfortable! They are smooth, light, and breathable. I absolutely love them. The sizing is perfect. I'm 5'5" and about 165lbs and I bought a size Medium. They fit perfectly with just the right amount of roominess. I typically like my pjs larger, so I almost bought the large, but I'm very happy I decided on the medium, so buy your true size. These are the most comfortable pjs I've owned and they are nicely constructed/well made, so they look nice too. These are a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft and comfy pajamas. I love them. They are really long too. I'm 5'7 ish (I've shrunk a bit) but I have always had long legs and PJ's are notorious for skimping on the leg and sleeve length. These are great in both sleeve and leg length. Very handsome.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pjs
customer_reviews.text: So comfy!! Bought these to pack in my hospital bag, currently 39 wks pregnant. Im petite 5'0 normally a small but with increase in hip and belly ended up getting a medium which fits well not too tight not too loose (ive gained 50 lbs). Material is so soft!! As expected length is long on me. Only downside is shipping does take a while, ordered Nov 10th received Dec 3rd.
customer_reviews.author: L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not bad fitting but one thing is wrong with these pajamas ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad fitting but one thing is wrong with these pajamas that I find very annoying. bUttons are so tiny that it is hard to button up the top and then they release at night as you sleep and roll over. most mornings I wake up with maybe 2 buttons buttons and the rest undone. Also the ribbon for the waist is a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Just bought 3 more pairs for my girlfriends
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas, they are so comfortable. I wear them to lounge in more than sleep, since they're a little heavier than I like to sleep in. They are silky-smooth and so cozy. It says to hand wash, but I used the delicates cold cycle in the washing machine, and then hung them to dry and they were totally fine. They're a little larger than I expected, but in a really nice way for lounge-wear. I just bought 3 pairs to give to my best girlfriends because I love these so much.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Love these pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I've been searching for sleepwear that doesn't have stars, and doggies, monkeys and other ridiculous looking decorations all over them. I'm a grown woman and a night trying to sleep with monkeys on my chest just isn't my style. Then I found the Ekouaer brand. Voila! I love them! They are so soft and oh so 'sleepable.' A great price for good quality. Even better, they look very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Neeley

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Remember that products in other areas fit differently before buying this. It definitely runs on the small side. The material itself does not breathe very well either. UPDATE * I have washed these a handful of times and they are already getting too worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Nb238

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly wonderful. The top is significantly longer than most other pajama tops in this style. Being 5’ 10” with a long torso pajama sets always felt more like high waters with a mid-drift on top. These pants are not only long enough (and comfortably so), but the top falls mid hip. They are super soft and I can already see these being a staple for my nighttime routine. I originally purchased them for our hospital stay post-delivery and now plan to purchase more to wear around the house once we return. Mommas, these are great for breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.author: sjbzher

customer_reviews.title: comfortable fabric. This is my second pair
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfortable fabric. This is my second pair, I purchased these PJs in black and loved them so much that I bought another pair. The fit is great they’re very, very comfortable and what I love best about them is that when I sleep at night the Pants leg doesn’t ride up my leg. I initially bought these because I wanted to make sure I had pajamas I can wear when we had houseguests —nothing too revealing but something that looks nice and was comfortable. These are perfect! as a matter of fact when we had friends stay with us she was wearing the same pajamas in navy !
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy quality pajamas
customer_reviews.text: This pajama set is so soft and well made. The drawstring means that as the garment ages, it will still fit. The sleeves are a bit long but I like that because they can easily be pushed up and cover my arms nicely. I like my pajamas to fit a bit large and these are roomy and comfortable. They smelled a bit strange (like chemicals) when they arrived so a quick wash and hang dry made them ready to wear to bed. I highly recommend these pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: MewerSoda

customer_reviews.title: Smelly material...great fit and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I Love the look, fit and feel of these jammies. Would have given a 5 star...BUUUUTTT, they Smell ! Sounds weird, but I have worn and washed them 4 times and they continue to smell like sewage water! Wonder if they came from and area that has experienced flooding or if the material was made with recycled refuse fron China. Horrible smelling material ! I have never experienced such a thing before. Will not order agsin, even though they are so comfy and nicely fabricated...can't het past the stench !
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because the reviews said they run big ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the reviews said they run big and are really long. Nope. They're small and very short. The buttons are too small and the top doesn't stay buttoned.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money! These pajamas (purple) are awful. I could've gotten better quality at Walmart for half the price. The buttons don't stay closed at all on the top, the fabric is thin and pilling after the first wear, the elastic rolls on the pants, and the 'drawstring' already fell out. Unfortunately, I didn't realize how lousy they were until after I washed and wore them. I own a navy set and they're so much nicer and better quality. I just assumed these would be the same and now I'm stuck with 2 sets of lousy pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Shirt is long
customer_reviews.text: The style mimics more expensive brands like Eberjay at less than half the cost. I found the material for these PJs to be thin but soft and mostly true to size - the bottoms fit but I found the shirt top to be quite long, coming down past my buttocks. Overall I wasn't crazy about the length of the shirt so I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: CLouise

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas made for a giraffe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL which is normally the size I wear. These pajamas were not an XL - they were made for someone with very very long arms and legs and a skinny torso. The elastic in the waist band was bad as it did not have any elasticity - like when elastic has been washed too much it breaks down. The arms hung past my finger tips a good six inches and the pants were equally as long. The fabric is made of polyester and does not have a good feel at all. Overall the quality of these pajamas is non-existent. I would not recommend that anyone purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morin

customer_reviews.title: SO nice. So very very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These pj's are fabulous. I love the slinky, soft, medium weight fabric. When you slip them on, you will go ahhhhhh, they feel THAT good against the skin. I bought one pair in the pretty baby blue, and then came back for the navy. Rayon is notorious for shrinking, so I washed them on cold and let them air dry. I am 65 years old and have bought many, many pajamas in my lifetime. These are the best! Great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: KarenR

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Pretty.  Seem to be very well made. Runs slightly big.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft. I like the design on the buttons and the piping. Just bought them so I haven't washed them yet. I'm guessing they will pill easily. I'll wash inside out on gentle. I'm 5'4" and wear a size 5. The sleeves come down to my fingers and the pants hit the floor so these should easily work for those folks who have trouble finding pj's that are long enough. I'm guessing they would fit really nice (lengthwise) up to 5'8".
customer_reviews.author: Sybrash

customer_reviews.title: Love,  but runs large
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and so comfortable, but definitely runs large. I'm 9 months pregnant and ordered a medium for rest/recovery time right after little one arrives and it fits really well right now! I am a size 6 (US ) pre-pregnancy to help understand actual product size and fit. It's also a little long. Definitely keeping and ordering a second set in small.
customer_reviews.author: ElaBella

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say that I absolutely love these! They are so soft!! Right after I wore them for the first time, I went to their website to see what else I could buy- I never do that! BUT, I find they run a little large. I'm 5'2 and feel like they're long- I should have gotten a size smaller than I normally would. But since I figured they're pajamas and it's ok for them to be loose, I went with my normal medium. Small would have been the way to go for sure. I also wish they had pockets on the pants. Otherwise, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas are comfortable but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Soft but doesn’t look as vibrant after washing. Runs slightly smaller than other brands. Was looking fir gray and this brand had the color.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: The color pink is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend for Christmas. The fit was spot on and looks great on her. Very soft and feels like quality pajamas. It lost 2 stars because the color pink doesn’t match the pics. This is more of a strangely over the top electric salmon color. The photos make it look more like a soft Barbie pink and the first thing my girlfriend said when she unwrapped it was “whoa... that pink...is crazy” and it wasn’t a good response. Luckily she still loves it but you could probably land a plane at night if she stood on the runway in pitch black and waved her arms.
customer_reviews.author: Rigel Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well-sized but pattern wasn't aligned front-to-back
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stretchy, non-wrinkling material that feels like a light jersey-knit. I'd give it 5 stars except the pattern does NOT line up at the side seams. One would think that would be a no-brainer with such a linear pattern, but both sets of pajamas that were purchased came with mal-aligned front-to-back patterns. If that doesn't bother you, these are a very nice quality pajama that fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and holding up well after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 7 months now and am currently buying another set in a different color to replace another pajama set from target that's disintegrated in the washing mashine. These pajamas are still my favorites, very soft and comfy, and you end up looking well put together. The only thing is that they smell a bit weird... After all these months, they just have this faint smell to them even straight out of the wash. Not even sure how to describe it. Hoping the next pair won't smell like this, but definitely not a deal breaker, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Excellent, I am one happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this product excellent in these categories: 1. Packaging - perfect 2. Fabric - Amazingly comfortable & soft 3. Product - Very nice quality, better than any PJ's at this price point, based on my experience. 4. One more thing, I Absolutely LOVED the card! Very unique, personable, Great Marketing & CUSTOMER Loyalty Tool, short, sweet, grateful, & to the point. Great graphics! PERFECT Guys! Don't change a thing 👍💕🤸
customer_reviews.author: Texlady

customer_reviews.title: So soft. So cute. So flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a Medium- but should've ordered small. They're too comfortable to take off and return though! Also, oversize pjs aren't the worst thing. These are my new favorites for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Willis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sewing and fabric
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was expecting higher quality. Unfortunately, I received thin fabric, crooked hems and bunched material around the corners. Immediately returned.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyQ

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for what they are. We got these for my hospital stay. They really are just ok. Not super comfortable and the stretch is there but has a bit of resistance as well...almost feels like it’s tearing instead of stretching. The extra fabric on the inside of the top makes it fold in an awkward way and overall the design cheapens the appearance of the pajamas. For the amount of money spent, I expected something nice and luxurious. I got a medium and there is no room for any extra movement after washing/hang drying. I usually wear a small. The ribbon is also an entirely different shade of pink than the piping. Again, cheapening the appearance. Dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Not a Jammie person but I’m converting
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING pajamas! I’m Currently almost 6 months pregnant, 5’6” and about 135 lbs. I got a medium and they are so cozy and soft and stretchy! I bought them to wear at the hospital and at home after delivery for breastfeeding and whatnot. I’m not really a “pajama person” but I may be a convert! Im due in the winter and I wasn’t planning on wearing them until after I have the baby butttttt I’m kind of thinking I’ll be in these come fall. I do think that the waistband might be a bit tight by 40 weeks, but will be perfect in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and material, but dont like the tightness at cuffs and waistband
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and material, but dont like the tightness at cuffs and waistband. I got the dark teal which is very nice and relaxing-- the buttons dont totally match and arent as nice as some higher end brands i have, but thats ok. the issue is that these are too tight at the cuffs both at the wrist and the ankle, which is not relaxing for lounging or sleeping. the tie at the waistband came out after one wash. I would keep looking for a good dupe for the eberjay style I love.
customer_reviews.author: noelle

customer_reviews.title: It's true they are very comfortable PJs
customer_reviews.text: It's true I could live just wearing this pj, they aren't 100% cotton but I think they are a very comfortable viscosa mix. I love buying sleeping wear and underwear that are 100% cotton but considering the reviews I decide to try. And I'm impressed, I supposed in warmer weather it's better go for just cotton or a short sleeve/short pants version. I'm 5'7 160 pound with latin hips and size L fits perfect. I washed them before and didn't shrink. Love the colors! And they are roomy very comfortable PJ. Very worthy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila liz

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfortable, and generously sized. I wear a US 8/10. I bought size Large and these are roomy, but that's good for PJs. The elastic in the waistband will fold over, which is midly annoying, but not a deal breaker. The elastic is sewn to the waistband so it stays put, but folds over itself inside the band. The ribbon tie is mostly useless, so I pulled it out. I also found that if I dry them in the dryer, they will shrink up a bit which is especially noticeable in the leg length, so I machine wash and hang to dry to avoid that. If the waistband was better designed, it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! But run very large. I bought a small but next time will order the extra small. ( I’m a size 4 petite in pants) I hemmed them. They were made for giants. Also they say hand wash??! Really. You’ll never sell any writing that in description. I Machine washed with my colors and DRYED in dryer too they’re great!! Who hand washes pjs?? I’m definitely going to order another color!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these, The sleeves and legs are long. I usually have trouble finding PJ's that are long enough. I was hoping to use for travel but they do not dry overnight. The draw string (a ribbon) is not necessary as the elastic in waist goes all the way. around I pulled it out. The waist is comfortable. I will buy again. Adding to my review/ the polka dots lay on top of the fabric and are wearing off! Elbows and rear are now solid! And after wearing for 3 months. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lorac

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am not much for writing reviews! But I must say how happy I am with this set. Planning on buying a second pair! They are exactly what I was looking for, super soft and comfortable. I am currently 8 months pregnant, I weigh 163 pounds and I got a medium and they actually fit little loose. Definitely thinking of getting one smaller size after baby comes. But still gets a 5 Star!
customer_reviews.author: Saad

customer_reviews.title: Too long but divinely soft
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft these PJs are and that the color is color fast. Unfortunately even though I’m 5’9”, the arms and legs are way too long. I washed these in hot water hoping they’d shrink. They didn’t. So I’ll hem them. Perfect other than the length and that sizing is larger than most of us would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to start, however not after washing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful however after washing, it did not hold up. It shrunk and curled horribly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Made for Giants!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pajamas but man, I ordered the 2x because I like loosely fitted pajamas. I'm an xl in everything else I buy. Needless to say these are NOT xxl, they're xxtall!!! The sleeves are at least 6 inches too long as is the length of the bottoms!! They are cut narrow through out and other than needing to be hemmed they're ok. I washed and dried both pieces hoping they'd shrink like the care instructions said, NOT!! I think better measurements should be given.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Shirt buttons always unbutton
customer_reviews.text: These jammies feel great and are comfortable, but the buttons do not stay buttoned. They do fit true to size with some extra comfort room. Before you know it, it's hanging on by one button. I have to wear a tank under or else I'll keep flashing my family. Husband doesn't mind of course.
customer_reviews.author: amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10, 140 lbs, and size M fit me very comfortably... sleeves and pant legs are long enough. Fabric is, indeed, very soft. The ribbon tie at the waist is not really necessary since the pants have an elastic waist. And there was one row of dots missing from the pants, but in a place that the top covers (no biggie... I'm not wearing them out on a date.) They also wash up nicely. When I opened the package when they arrived, the dots were all sticking to each other. I only got dots because solid navy was not available in my size. They don't stick like that since I washed them though.
customer_reviews.author: GLK

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting PJ's
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a thin cotton PJ with long sleeves. These are not thin cotton, but they are an extremely soft lightweight jersey-like material. Nights are still warm where I live (So. California), so I'm sure when the temps cool off a bit, these will provide adequate warmth overnight. I'm 5'2", average weight, and I ordered a Medium which fits me loosely, which I like. The legs are a bit too long, but, hey, they're pajamas, I'm not wearing them outside, so being a little too long is not a problem. I got the sky blue cloud pattern, and I love them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CapriciousB

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend for Christmas, she loved it, said it was comfortable, but now that its summer she's stopped wearing them since she said it gets too warm. but the material was really soft, not flannel thick but thick for pajamas i think, but thats coming from a guy who sleeps in shorts and an undershirt haha.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Very good pajamas
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very soft with a bit of stretch Fit is true to size, cut very generously. Wide comfortable waistband that does not roll. Well sewn with attention to details. One drawback is this fabric doesn't like heat so no tumble dry . Good enough I ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Sizes for top and bottom are different sizes-Comfy material though!
customer_reviews.text: I lovvve these but cannot wear them...the pants are at least a size too big abd the top spreads around the buttons (not good if bust size C or larger)...However the sleeves went onto my palm and to my mid-thigh. Wish I could mix the top and bottom sizes as one is too big and the other doesn’t fit right. If you are a tall model, wear cup sizes A or B-PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful IN Hope!

customer_reviews.title: My new favorites
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pjs. They look great, fit perfectly, and are super soft. I’ll be buying sets for my sister and mother for Christmas as well! I’m 5’7, 140 with a long torso and the top fits perfectly. Let’s and arms fit (for me) on the long side, but that’s what I was looking for. They cover my wrists and ankles. The buttons stay secure while tossing and turning during sleep. I get very hot during sleep and this fabric is breathable/perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, but buttons come undone easily!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material and the sizing is spot on (5’9”, 135, size M). Even washes well. Two cons: the ribbon drawstring doesn’t have any kind of knot or “stopper” to keep it from getting swallowed by the elastic if you were to pull one side... and the buttons unbutton very easily, like when shifting positions during the night. It’s as if the button holes are too big/ loose, or something. Otherwise, very comfy and soft, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: EnTK

customer_reviews.title: $$$ for a cheap PJ, runs large.
customer_reviews.text: I felt like these run large. The material is soft and very stretchy. They wash up... just ok. Got these as a gift, and had my husband not removed the tags and tossed the packaging I would have returned for a smaller size. I don’t feel like these are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are SO comfortable. I would have given them 5 stars just for the comfort, but the sleeves are very long and they cling a bit, so not too flattering on me. They are very pretty. Love the color. Of course that is more my problem, if you have a flat stomach, they will look gorgeous on you! Also the draw string cane out when I washed them. Order them! They will be the most comfortable pajamas you’re ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Soooo soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get all the bad reviews on these!! I sized up to a Med cause I like room for my PJs and the length is great.. I’m 5’5 and they are long for me.. I have long legs so finding pajamas long enough is hard and the top is perfect size also! Fabric is super soft. Upon reading, I will wear untill they smell haha so I don’t have to wash them yet. Hoping the softness doesn’t go away. I will update in a few weeks but as of right now.. I’m ordering every color!!! Love these way more then any old navy and target Pajama!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No pockets for lavender
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these pajamas. The first I bought were the navy blue with pink piping. And the drawstring was the same material as the pajamas, and there's we're pockets on the pants. Then 1 yr later, I bought the lavender with white piping. But there were no pockets and the drawstring was almost like a ribbon material--it didn't really hold up through the first few wears. Those navy pajamas are my favorite, I just wish the lavender is m ones had pockets
customer_reviews.author: K. James

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love, but...
customer_reviews.text: These did not wash well. After the initial wash, the cuff on the pants below the piping became distorted. It's a little hard to describe but instead of falling smooth/flat like it did upon arrival, the cuff now looks more like a ruffle. It's not as obvious on the sleeves. Worth noting: The care instructions on the product description page (machine wash/dry) do not match the care instructions on the tag (machine wash/no dryer). Fabric is soft and comfy, but clingy. Would recommend ordering a size bigger, especially if between sizes postpartum, for a more flattering fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great find! Give them a try.
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous about buying clothes online but decided to give these a try after reading the reviews. I'm a few weeks away from having my second baby and wanted a nice pair of pjs to wear now, at the hospital and post baby. I usually wear 8-10 and bought a size medium. These pjs are so incredibly comfortable and flattering. A little nervous they might shrink when I wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Defective Material
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pajama set as a gift for my wife. Upon receiving them she loved them. Very soft material, flattering fit and overall very comfortable. She loved them, that was until the first time washing them. I am not sure if we got a defective set but the first time washing them (which was done to the specifications on tag) and there is a large hole already in the top portion of the pajamas. Could not find the contact information for the seller to see if they could make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!  Roomy and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Love these PJs. Very soft and fit well. I was worried when I received them and looked at the tag and it said not to dry them in the dryer! It was my fault that I did not see that before I ordered them. It was stated on the website. BUT - I did it any way (I just cannot hang my pjs to dry!). I've dried them about a dozen times by now and they are FINE! No shrinkage and the color is holding out. I wash them in cold. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: AArd

customer_reviews.title: Nice until you wash them
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about these pajamas. I really loved them at first. They are comfortable, flattering and the materials feels nice. However, I’ve washed the pajama set three (3) times and now I feel like throwing them away. After only 3 washes, they look like they’ve been washed 100 times. It’s odd because certain parts of the fabric still look brand new, while other parts are now badly faded. Also, after the very first wash, the waistband ribbon came out completely. I mean I guess they’ll still be comfortable, but they look raggedy now and I’m afraid to see what they’ll look like after 3 more washes! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: aimee j.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable and cute pjs
customer_reviews.text: I am currently 30 weeks pregnant and I bought this pjs to be my maternity gown. Got a size Medium (I’m 5.5 tall and 168lb). I think it’s perfect fit , I can still grown some belly into the top as you can see in the photo. The material feels REALLY good !!!! I’m in love and shocked with the quality 👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: elthon

customer_reviews.title: All reds are red
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to have a matching set with my friends during a vacation. Two of us got the wine red color while the other two Got the cherry red color. All of us loved the feel of the fabric and the fit. We range from 5'2" to 6'0" and small to 2xL. The color of the fabric didn't necessarily match the color of the photo. our pajamas were pretty much all a blood red regardless of the color we chose. Overall, it's a great set of pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Sizing for Ekouaer Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’3”, 125 lbs. My first order was for a small and the fit was large. The fits through the shoulders are large, arms are long, and pants are long. However, I loved them and immediately ordered another Ekouaer pajama of another color (same style) extra small. The fit is perfect. These PJ’s are very comfy and great to wear during any season.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Duggins

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase these at the price but I liked the style in the picture and Amazon has always been good about returns so I thought I’d give them a chance and I’m glad I did. They are perfect. If you want them loose then go with your original size but if you want them more fitted then I’d go a size smaller, other then that they are so comfy and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but fade quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute PJs, and comfortable enough, but the elastic waistband could be a little looser. Pajamas should not be the wardrobe item to let you know you've gotten a little fat during the quarantine. My biggest complaint is that the fabric fades quickly. I bought these in February, and they look like I've had them for years already. Overall, they're a little pricey for the quality, but still super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Vibranze

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest PJ's!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best PJ's I've owned. Was a bit skeptical to buy at first as I wasn't sure how the fit was going to be. But I read all the reviews and followed my gut to get my true size. So glad I did! It's also perfect for those cold nights at home, but I also don't sweat at night which is a HUGE plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Keeks Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great Fabric
customer_reviews.text: This pajama set is soft, comfortable, and flattering. The material is breathable and lightweight. The pants are a bit long on me, but I expected this since I am 5'2. Overall, great, light, and comfortable set. FYI - the tag says handwash only. I washed in cold water and dried on low heat with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Come and so cute
customer_reviews.text: Fit is true to size. I am 5'2" and weigh 113. The XS fit great. I had ordered a couple of pairs of these with shorts and short sleeve top. Then I ordered the long pants, long sleeved pjs in the same colors. I love that I can wear them that way or opt to wear the long pants with the short sleeve tops or the shorts with the long sleeve top.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Awful elastic at waist, but smooth slinky fabric
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was wonderfully soft and slinky. However, the elastic in the waistband is very thick and rigid. For me, it felt very uncomfortable because it was very noticeable during wear. The rest of the fabric was really smooth and lovely, but the elastic was so cheap and awful, I ended up removing it and sewing in a better quality elastic myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why these PJ's were so highly rated. I've had these for months and I've decided to donate them. The buttons on the front are too small and open way too easily. I wake up with half the buttons undone. Also, the drawstring slips out of the pants pretty easily. Tried to sow it in but it did not work. Was going to have the buttons on the front sewn shut, but why spend the additional $? Lastly, these are pretty thick. I thought the material would have been lighter and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas! I wanted something I could lounge & sleep in, these are really soft, nice feel, and they look nice. I plan on getting a couple more colors.. I wish the top was a little larger/looser. The pants fit perfectly but the top is a little too form fitting. That could just be me though, my "girls" are kinda big and I'm in denial about my actual size. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful PJs!
customer_reviews.text: These PJs are super comfortable- soft and cozy against the skin. I like them a lot because, as a taller woman, I always have difficulty finding PJs that reach my wrist and ankles, and these fit beautifully. The fabric quality seems solid- been washed a few times and still holding up very well! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in sleeve length
customer_reviews.text: I have longer than average arms and was hopeful that these would work. I ordered to use in the hospital after delivery. However, trying these on right away showed the sleeves were about 2 inches too short on both sleeves. I ordered a medium and am 5’7” and 36 weeks pregnant. The top fit around my belly and the pants were perfect length, but I just can’t live with the sleeves. So disappointed as this appeared to be one of a few options for long arms.
customer_reviews.author: Woodward Family

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Chic!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of these pajamas. They are really soft and thin so as to not be too hot. They are also very chic, in terms of pajamas. Just wanted something that looked nice. I wanted to try the small, even though I am usually an extra small, because I really liked the color. But they were quite large so I had to exchange them. Wish they fit, because they are very nice! I will try an extra small next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The hot pink is not pink.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas so much, I ordered a third pair in "hot pink". My first pairs were grey and navy. I am disappointed that this pair are a shocking color, more of a day-glo salmon than pink. I just noticed a similar recent review, describing the color as useful for aiding navigation at an airport. Older reviews make no mention of the harsh color. Also, I noticed that the video of the hot pink pajamas that was included in the description of the product is no longer posted, so perhaps this is a recent change. I will be returning these. The are much too bright and orange.
customer_reviews.author: Iko Iko

customer_reviews.title: Lovely hang to the fabric - surprisingly nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this set. The fabric is a lovely weight without being sheer or too thin, or overly thick and heavy. It has a lovely hang. I will certainly be buying another set. Sleeves are long for the sizing, which isn't a problem for me, but all else is exactly what I'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the softness and style best ever. I’m 5’3”; 145lbs, in between petite and women’s regular. I bought ladies small. The sleeves run some what long, but not enough to be a problem, and the pants fit nicely but also a bit long. I think the medium would have fit better in the bust line, but would have been to big for me in the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect PJs!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pajamas! I've been living in them the past couple days and just ordered two more pairs. I love the variety in colors and patterns, the stretch they offer, and the fact that they're so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton Harding

customer_reviews.title: Too short after washing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and loved the shortie pajama set so I tried this one. It seems like the same material but they shrank a bunch and no longer fit. Wish I could return them
customer_reviews.author: L. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before I bought the product. Everyone said these run big, but that isn’t true. I normally wear a small and I am very petite, but I ordered a medium wanting these oversized. The pants are more fitted, the waist band is awful and the fabric is scratchy feeling. I won’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The pants ran a bit smaller than indicated so I would have liked to have a bigger size to ensure comfort. Bought them to wear after having my baby and they did ok. Would have preferred one more button on the top to ensure I didn’t have so much cleavage. if I got a size bigger to try and get the bottoms to work better, I think the top wouldn’t have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Some PJs are cut weird
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of these pajamas and one of the pairs had a weird cut on the top. The buttons drift off to the side towards the bottom. I think this is the result of a poor cut on the cloth, rather than how the top is sewn. Had I not washed them I would have returned them. Otherwise, they are soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Best Postpartum Outfit!!!
customer_reviews.text: A few days postpartum, and I was sleeping in button down shirts! I needed comfortable PJs that I could easily button down for breastfeeding. These are exactly that. I bought one pair and was living in them, so I bought 2 more! These are also cute enough to wear on a regular basis. I don't give a lot of 5⭐, but these were exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable pajamas - perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Wanting new comfy pajamas while I finish up pregnancy went for these and so glad I did! I'm 5'7 and currently weigh 142 lbs and they fit perfect every which way, including length. (i bought medium) usually pajama pants are too short and these are just right. the material is the softest/most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: WalkingDragon

customer_reviews.title: Pants not for maternity
customer_reviews.text: Many people commented that they used these while pregnant. I am 30 weeks pregnant (normally 63” 120lb- currently 145lb). I ordered a medium. Shirt actually fit great, pants were long but the main issue is that they were tight under my belly- maybe I just carry low but I could not wear these while pregnant. I am returning for a small to wear postpartum as they will be great for nursing.
customer_reviews.author: EleanorsMama

customer_reviews.title: Winter pjs to snuggle up in!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I actually bought them a size bigger than my normal size just so they’d be a little loose. I needed a pair of comfy pjs to wear after tanning (for a bodybuilding competition) and these totally worked! But! They are so cute and comfy that now I just use them as pjs and they are becoming one of my favorite sets because they are just so cozy for winter. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Super JuJu-Bean

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The material is a very soft feeling, sort of thin fabric. The pants were a little too small on me, but the top fit. I am 5'3 140lbs and ordered the small. Tried to go back and cancel my order after reading more reviews about the sizing, but was unable to get it cancelled in time. Fortunately, the medium pants fit better with the small top. (Now I own the too-small bottoms and a too-big top... hmmm!) Very comfy PJ set though, and looks flattering. Can't wait to wear on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Sno

customer_reviews.title: Used to like these but new fabric is itchy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought three pairs of these and was so excited to buy the tropical ones. However, they seem to have changed the fabric because the tropical print ones are some of the itchiest PJs ever!! They feel like sandpaper and I couldn’t sleep they were so bad. Previous pairs I’ve bought have been very soft and comfortable but these tropical print ones are truly awful and terrible. Do not waste your money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really soft. Ordered a medium, bigger than I prefer (baggy and long) but fearful that a small would be too small (I'm 5'2" 120#). Packaged well and appears new and unworn but there's a smell to it. I'm guessing a wash cycle will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Its aboyd

customer_reviews.title: TREAT YOURSELF!!!
customer_reviews.text: These PJ’s are amazing!!! The material is soft, they’re actually very elegant. Look and feel expensive. I have been looking for a nice pj set and these far exceed my expectations. I didn’t want to take them off and wanted to wear them out of the house lol. So I ended up buying the short set too!! TREAT YOURSELF!! You won’t regret it!! I’m getting more for myself and gifts and vacations. “One for you, and 1,2 for me” hehe 🙃!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chill

customer_reviews.title: Buttons don’t stay buttoned
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest most comfy pajamas I own with one exception... The buttons do not stay buttoned like at all. It’s a good thing I live alone or my entire family would see my boobs hanging out! I wish they would fix the button issue and I would buy several more pairs... :(
customer_reviews.author: LJ777

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable, but had a couple issues right away
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, and the material is very soft. But they came with one string on the pants frayed and messed up, and as soon as I unbuttoned the top to try it on, one of the buttons popped off. Luckily we were able to sew it back on quickly, but for the price for these, those things shouldn’t have been an issue. Also they smelled funny after taking them out of the package, but I’m sure that will go away after washing. I’m 5’5 125 lbs, and I bought a small. Fits well. The pants are nice and long which I like. Overall I like them and would consider buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rebecca Jean Heiney

customer_reviews.title: Soft, quality fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft, quality fabric ... as nice, or almost nicer than the TJ brand at a fraction of the cost ... plus. Amazon offers returns while the other, branded item generally does not. I highly recommend as a quality alternative to other designer brands out there, and intend to purchase more for myself...
customer_reviews.author: dpc3103

customer_reviews.title: They are super soft high quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Med- I am 5' and 132 lbs. with D size boobs. They are super soft high quality. They are for sure made for a tall person or at least 5'4 or above. I roll them up at the waist and the sleeves. But they are sophisticated looking and I like a little baggy for what I sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: DESpenc

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this sleepwear product. She believe that they are great for lounging as well as comfortable when sleeping. The only drawback, she claims, is that they must be hand washed. Otherwise, she thinks they are extremely comfortable, fashionable, and fit well Made me into a hero for the gift purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa S

customer_reviews.title: The waist is small with thick elastic waistband.  33" on a size large, way too small to sleep in.
customer_reviews.text: I went up one size to a large in due to the reviews. The pajamas run small, especially at the waist with a thick 1.5" wide elastic waistband, 33" waist on size large. I weigh 137, size 10, and normally wear a size medium in Nordstrom moonlight pajamas. They were out of stock so I thought I'd try Amazon. These are a cheap immitation. Very disappointed in the quality, fit and overall appearance, especially that thick small uncomfortable waist band. Pocket doesn't lay flat, sleeves are shorter than they should be.
customer_reviews.author: CWD

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Cozy, but light and stretchy. Get a little stretched out, but not bad for the quality. Would recommend sizing down, as they are a bit big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PJs!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend-- Great style, price and speedy delivery. Love the design, feel and looser fit! I kept these though they are coral, rather than pink.
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So soft, really beautiful, I love them and now have two colours
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great for post delivery
customer_reviews.text: Got these for immediately after childbirth. Wanted a top easy for breastfeeding and loose, comfy bottoms. These did the trick but the only thing is, the buttons come undone a little too easily so wear a bra or cami under if you have visitors coming. Liked the material a lot as it is soft, cool, cotton with a bit of stretch and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: Love these pj's. I always get so many compliments when I wear them. They're incredibly comfortable and stylish at the same time. I will buy in more colors. The only sad thing is that it's really easy to lose the ribbon that ties the pants together in the waistband.
customer_reviews.author: saraster

customer_reviews.title: Bingo...Nailed It!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Well made....high end feel and look. I'm buying for the women in my family as s Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a little bit disappointed by this product
customer_reviews.text: I am a little bit disappointed by this product : it is 95 percent viscose and 5 percent elastane and not 95% cotton. The product is also too large as expected, so if you want to buy one you should take the size below.
customer_reviews.author: Bellon Osanne

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and I. They debuted on Christmas. I have two sets. Packable, nice quality. Cute buttons. The fit is a little small. They’ll shrink a bit in the dryer. I’m 5’-7”, 130lbs. Small was a bit tight at the waist. Medium was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Design Hole

product_meta.title: Ekouaer Pajamas Set Long Sleeve Sleepwear Womens Button Down Nightwear Soft Pj Lounge Sets XS-XXL
feature_bullets: Super comfortable – Ekouaer pajamas set made from 95% Viscose+5% elastane premium-quality materials
Two-Piece cute sleepwear pajamas featuring long sleeve top and pants for relaxed fit
Top: Button-down sleep shirt hits at hip ,chest pocket with notch collar
Bottom: Pant with chiffon drawstring elastic waist,this soft pajama pants making relaxing as comfortable as possible.Comfort and lightweight sleepwear for women is the best pajamas
Handwash.To prevent wrinkles, no dryer.Our size are standard US size,please just choose your normal sleepwear size
